程序包 android.car.media

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    AudioZonesMirrorStatusCallback
    Callback for car audio zones mirror playback status
    CarAudioManager.AudioEventCallback  
    CarMediaManager.MediaSourceChangedListener
    Listener for updates to the primary media source
    CarVolumeGroupEventCallback
    Interface to listen to events impacting volume groups.
    MediaAudioRequestStatusCallback
    Callback for media request in primary audio zone
    PrimaryZoneMediaAudioRequestCallback
    Interface to listen for audio media requests in primary zone
    SwitchAudioZoneConfigCallback
    Callback to informed about car audio zone configuration request results
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    CarAudioManager
    APIs for handling audio in a car.
    CarAudioManager.CarAudio3DModeCallback
    3D音效开关回调代理
    CarAudioManager.CarAudioEffectCallback
    3D音效回调代理
    CarAudioManager.CarAudioFieldCallback
    声场变化回调监听
    CarAudioManager.CarEventListenner
    定制车身信号回调
    CarAudioManager.CarVolumeCallback
    Callback interface to receive volume change events in a car.
    CarAudioPatchHandle
    A class to encapsulate the handle for a system level audio patch.
    CarAudioZoneConfigInfo
    Class to encapsulate car audio zone configuration information.
    CarMediaIntents
    Defines media related intents (and their extras) for the car.
    CarMediaManager
    API for updating and receiving updates to the primary media source in the car.
    CarVolumeGroupEvent
    Class to encapsulate car volume group event information.
    CarVolumeGroupEvent.Builder
    A builder for CarVolumeGroupEvent
    CarVolumeGroupInfo
    Class to encapsulate car volume group information.
    CarVolumeGroupInfo.Builder
    A builder for CarVolumeGroupInfo
  • 注释类型概要

    CarAudioManager.MediaAudioRequestStatus
